item.title: Return statements
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Lol. For your first problem…

public static int (int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 14086) { return 5; } else { return 0; } }

I Don’t get your second problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Return statements
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

How could i use 2 return statements in a public static int

example

i have

public static int (int ItemID){
if (ItemID == 14086) {
return 5;
}
return 0;
}

but i need it so that it can return 1,2,3,5 for those items.

public static int (int ItemID){
if (ItemID == 14086) {
return 5;
return 3;
return 2;
return 1;
}
return 0;
}

Read full topic
